facts.1: Peanut butter cookies were first introduced in the early 1900s.
facts.2: The classic crisscross pattern on peanut butter cookies is made with a fork.
facts.3: Peanut butter cookies are a popular treat in the United States, especially during the holidays.

facts.1: Red roses are a symbol of love and romance.
facts.2: The red rose is the national flower of England.
facts.3: Red roses have been cultivated for over 5,000 years.

facts.1: Loving Day commemorates the anniversary of the 1967 Supreme Court decision in Loving v. Virginia.
facts.2: The decision struck down laws banning interracial marriage in the United States.
facts.3: Loving Day is celebrated annually on June 12th to promote diversity and inclusion.
